html:
7.16.25  10:21 am   do you think its important to enjoy what you're doing to some extent, when creating art?

      yes i believe so

7.16.25  10:07 am   I'm kind of confused. No pressure to help, but if you could I'd appreciate it! Is a minor seventh chord - we can use Gm7 as an example - supposed to be read as a minor chord, with a minor seventh (G Bb D F), or is it a G chord, with a minor seventh (G B D F)? Thank you and have a great day!

      a chord called "G minor 7", often written as "Gmin7", or "G-7", or "Gmi7", will most importantly include notes Bb and F, then less crucial but likely containing note D, and in the bass will be note G. the other chord you mentioned (with note B instead of Bb) will be known as 'G7'

7.16.25  10:04 am   Are you still being normal? Your responses don't specify if you are doing normal things

      i am extremely un-normal, which is a side effect of being extremely normal

7.16.25  10:01 am   why is one thing different because of the way another thing is? 

      this is thanks to a pesky little phenomenon called 'contextual understanding'

7.16.25  9:44 am   have you ever made a bread sandwich

      i started making one a long time ago but never finished

7.16.25  9:18 am   What ingredients can I use for my sandwich?

      how about some cold hard spam

7.16.25  9:06 am   On the 16th May 2017, on this very page, you said "bees are ok". Do you stand by this?

      it was not necessarily meant to be a binding statement, but i don't disagree with it

7.16.25  7:32 am   Is good bad?

      that would explain a lot

7.16.25  6:14 am   Can you answer any question? 

      any quesiton except this one. wait oops

7.16.25  6:10 am   have you ever written a story outside of music? if not, what would you write about?

      usually i just start writing and then optionally argue about what it's about when it's done

7.16.25  4:50 am   There's something irresistable about lyrics with American place names, I think. I'm not American myself so perhaps that would contribute, but I've heard American songwriters say the same thing. Memphis, Lafayette, Mississippi Delta, and in the  day goes on, you got "Went down to Virginia". What is it about these names? And do you think this can be achieved with non American places in the same flavour? What about the ballad of British Columbia, or Auckland, or Jervis Bay?

      'india' is pretty nice. or 'mongolia'

7.16.25  4:33 am   When i make music, i always never satisfied with it even though i don't have anything to do to the music, it's done but i'm not comfortable to upload it. Why does that happen?

      because you 'care'

7.16.25  4:03 am   how do i get ideas

      everything is an idea. so, you already have them

7.16.25  3:47 am   Have you ever write a song on a odd time signature?

      usually when odd time signatures are used it's only for one bar, or just part of the song. i've certainly done that

7.16.25  2:18 am   Is fiction just a reflection of real life?

      it can be, but it doesn't have to be. no i changed my mind, it has to be derived from real life somehow, even if it's a very distant connection

7.16.25  1:02 am   when you said "it was f.i.c.t.i.o.n." were you already preparing for someone to ask you what that stands for

      sure. but it stands for fiction. i placed dots between the letters for e.m.p.h.a.s.i.s.

7.16.25  12:42 am   do you think fish get thirsty?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

7.16.25  12:17 am   what's your favorite album of 2025 so far?

      didnt even know they still have albums in 2025

7.15.25  11:22 pm   how would you rate the cuteness of the creatures belonging to the vulpes genus? best ballpark figure

      never heard of it

7.15.25  11:17 pm   How do you stop frustration from turning into hopelessness when you don't have any action you can take?

      work on something completely different

7.15.25  11:09 pm   why do I find she's so heavy by the Beatles anxiety inducing

      maybe that's the one that has a lot of yelling. is that the one with a lot of yelling, i could be wrong

7.15.25  11:02 pm   how do i get over the sound of my own voice?

      i don't really know

7.15.25  10:17 pm   does soup is make?

      yes, this is the first principle of soup

7.15.25  9:27 pm   Why aren't you going to Los Angeles next week?

      too many reasons to even explain here

7.15.25  9:14 pm   Which game show am I going to win?

      it's one that doesn't exist yet, but you are not going to win as a contestant, you are going to be the creator and executive producer of the game and make a handsome fortune

7.15.25  8:23 pm   What s my number

      ∞

7.15.25  8:22 pm   how was your day

      pretty good

7.15.25  7:57 pm   why

      due to the

7.15.25  7:55 pm   if you were a number from 1

      2

7.15.25  7:43 pm   How do you not lose against stairs?

      stairs are on your side. stairs want you to win

7.15.25  7:32 pm   bunkbeds - are they one bed or two beds?

      2in1

7.15.25  7:16 pm   best upcoming questions?

      someone's gonna ask one of the things that everyone always asks

7.15.25  6:24 pm   Do you think everyone should have complete freedom to do whatever they want or feel like doing?

      so crazy it just might work

7.15.25  6:01 pm   Do you ever take a day off?

      yes but it doesn't stop there; sometimes i'll take a day off from taking a day off

7.15.25  5:11 pm   why does the major chord sound that good (and the minor chord and etc.)

      i don't actually think it sounds that good

7.15.25  4:21 pm   Which groove do you like most? Swing or Bossa

      i would like to 'accidentally' forget which is which

7.15.25  4:08 pm   What do you think is a misconception about you

      people are probably wrong about the number of misconceptions there are about me. but perhaps this is just due to a rounding error

7.15.25  4:03 pm   who is the real underdog in Tom & Jerry? Is it Jerry the Mouse because he's small and the cat tries to eat him, or is it Tom because Jerry is devilishly devious and takes a pleasure out of making Tom suffer?

      the scales being so balanced is exactly what makes for a good story. story writers sometimes ask themselves, "who is the underdog right now"? and then they try balance it out

7.15.25  3:58 pm   why porridge in an airport terminal?

      it's called i screwed up the bridge

7.15.25  2:56 pm   youre human?

      oh man that would explain some of these ridiuclous mood swings, and cheeseburger cravings

7.15.25  2:36 pm   i would just like to say that you have somehow permanently affected my speech. like, if it wasn't for you, i would've still been using capital letters outside of a professional setting
anyways do you have any more tips to speak in the same Vibe

      speak in a different vibe

7.15.25  1:26 pm   Which celestial body (other than Earth and the Moon) is most likely to influence your future sense of direction while creating music?

      the sun

7.15.25  10:53 am   can i write your name on my bra

      only if absolutely necessary

7.15.25  10:22 am   Do you watch any sports

      no, but i could

7.15.25  9:07 am   is this a question?

      yes it is

7.15.25  6:38 am   what would you name a pet lizard

      i got out of the pet naming game. too much racket

7.15.25  6:28 am   what cheese is the moon made of

      cold hard rock. actually it might be kind of soft, i'm not really sure

7.15.25  4:55 am   You often try to be reasonable, but what's the most unreasonable thing you've done recently?

      almost everything i do is unreasonable

7.15.25  3:48 am   Will you ever make sad music or have you already made sad music before?

      music is where sad and happy can finally connect. i exploit this heartily

7.15.25  3:33 am   will we ever get to see any characters from previous songs/videos

      i bet you never thought you wanted to see those characters before you saw them for the first time. by that token, imagine all the new things you don't even know you want to see
